titleStmt.title: A fit guest for the Lords table. Or, a treatise declaring the true vse of the Lords Supper Profitable for all communicants, as a preseruatiue against all profanesse and sundry nouell opinions.
titleStmt.author: Tuke, Thomas, d. 1657.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Edw: Allde, and are to be sold by H. Rockit, at his shop in the Poultry, vnder the Diall,

notesStmt.note: Copy at reel 2086 lacks leaves K2-K7.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
